feature.label: ABAP Search and Analysis Tools
feature.description: Provides Tools for extended ABAP Object search. Currently the following ABAP Types are supported - CDS View - Database Table/View - Class/Interface Furthermore it provides a View for analyzing CDS Views. The following analyses are supported at the moment. - Top-Down analysis of a CDS View - Used-Entities analysis of a CDS View - Where-Used in CDS View for a CDS View/Database table/Database view - Field Analysis for a CDS View/Database table/Database view
